refnamediv.refpurpose: reset minmax table entries to initial values

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: glResetMinmax resets the elements of the current minmax table to their initial values: the ``maximum'' element receives the minimum possible component values, and the ``minimum'' element receives the maximum possible component values.

refsect1.title: Notes
refsect1.para: glResetMinmax is present only if GL_ARB_imaging is returned when glGetString is called with an argument of GL_EXTENSIONS.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: GL_INVALID_ENUM is generated if target is not GL_MINMAX.
GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glResetMinmax is executed between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding execution of glEnd.
